rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Reception
rooms.description: Spacious foyer with a welcoming Chettinad-style archway, incorporating traditional motifs and vibrant color palettes. Features wheelchair accessibility with wide doorways.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living space that merges dining and lounge areas. Designed for social gatherings and equipped with low-profile furniture to accommodate wheelchair accessibility, ensuring ample circulation space.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Duplex Studio)
rooms.description: Primary bedroom integrated within the duplex studio apartment, featuring Vastu-aligned placement of furniture, natural light, and accessible design elements such as grab bars and lowered counters.

rooms.name: Guest Suite
rooms.description: Dedicated guest suite with a bed area, closet, and private bathroom. Incorporates traditional Chettinad detailing along with accessibility considerations for wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Kitchenette & Utility Area
rooms.description: Compact yet functional kitchen designed with modern appliances integrated with traditional design elements. Features lower countertops and accessible cabinetry to meet wheelchair requirements.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Separate quarters for domestic help, featuring a small bedroom, wash area, and storage, designed according to local norms and Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible sliding entrance door with reinforced framing following Vastu principles for auspicious entry.

openings.name: Window Openings in Living Area
openings.description: Traditional Chettinad-style casement windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation while maintaining cultural aesthetics.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Access
openings.description: Accessible outdoor access to a swimming pool area designed with wheelchair-friendly ramps and slip-resistant surfaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Private suite including an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, and balcony with views. Designed using Chettinad motifs and Vastu-aligned spatial planning.

rooms.name: Study/Office Space
rooms.description: Dedicated study area equipped for work or leisure. Features low-profile desks and ample lighting, following accessibility guidelines.

openings.name: Balcony Access Door
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible balcony door ensuring smooth transition between interior and exterior spaces.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Dual-function ramp and staircase to facilitate both wheelchair access and traditional step access for able-bodied users, ensuring compliance with accessibility norms.
